title: RBI MPC Meet: Governor Shaktikanta Das warns banks on asset-liability risks
description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Shaktikanta Das has cautioned banks about potential asset-liability mismatches if they rely too heavily on short-term bulk deposits. He noted that as households shift their savings to alternative investments, banks face challenges in funding, with deposit growth lagging behind loan growth.
